summary: In 1997 strange lights were witnessed flying over the Phoenix sky, and in their wake a "man" appeared. Jimmy and Father Michael feel their lives affected by this stranger. What Father Michael discovers defies his beliefs.
cast: Michael Tassoni|Richard Glover|Ivan Roberto Acuña|Javier Aguilar|Ariel Arce|Tom Basham|Ismael Benitez Benitez|Lori Brandt|Tatiana Bustamante|Celia Charlesworth|Mark Collver|Cristopher Cottingham|Patrick Cottingham|Scott Dillon|Trish Duell|Ramses Arce Fierro|Juan Alfredo Vega Garcia|Skyler Griffin|Slade Hall|Sam Hernandez|Jesus A. Jaramillo|Irene Larios|Mancine Lewandorosky|David Lewin|Marta Celina García Lohn|Manuel Rafael Duarte Madrigal|Jorge Luis Marquez Matrecilos|Mike Mikl|Mahcbub H. Tierney|Jennifer Vlaicevic|Garrett Wylen
title: Conspiracy Encounters
